entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 21 with temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 21 with temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
